caption.p: Chemical structure and cytotoxicity of erucic acid. (A) 1H and 13C-NMR spectra for the compound isolated from Isatis indigotica Fort. recorded in CDCl 3. (B) Chemical structure of erucic acid. (C) Cytotoxic effects of erucic acid on viability of A549 cells. A549 cells were incubated with varying concentrations of erucic acid for 48 h and viability was determined by MTT assay. Data are presented as the mean ± standard error of the mean, representative of three independent experiments. ∗ P < 0.01 vs. untreated control.
